entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
